name: Dust Brothers
description: The '''Dust Brothers''' are a pair of songwriters and [[record producer|producers]] consisting of E.Z. Mike ([[Michael Simpson (producer)|Michael Simpson]]) and King Gizmo ([[John King (record producer)|John King]]). They are famous for the [[Sampling (music)|sample]]-based music they produced in the 1980s and 1990s, and specifically for their work on the albums ''[[Paul's Boutique]]'' by [[Beastie Boys]], ''[[Odelay]]'', ''[[Midnite Vultures]]'' and ''[[Guero]]'' by [[Beck]], the [[Fight Club (Soundtrack)|soundtrack to ''Fight Club'']], and "[[MMMBop]]" by [[Hanson (band)|Hanson]]. They are based in [[Los Angeles, California]].
